title: Digital Media-Based Project Learning Design for Secondary Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and experience with digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: Students learn to design and operate project-based learning (PBL) environments by integrating secondary science education theory with digital media production skills

learning_goals: Learners can create a PBL (Project-Based Learning) lesson plan that integrates core concepts required by secondary science education standards with digital media.
Learners can produce and apply educational digital content (videos, infographics, etc.) addressing science-society issues (climate change, energy problems, etc.) in teaching contexts.
Learners can analyze the educational effectiveness of PBL learning activities through peer assessment and propose improvement strategies.

resources: Digital Production Tools (Canva, Adobe Spark, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
